      • once

        public static TimeReact once(long timeout)
        Factory to create a time based react. Emit a signal only one time after timeout.
        Parameters:
        timeout - time to wait before emitting message
        Returns:
        the time react

      • every

        public static TimeReact every(long timeout)
        Factory to create a time based react. Emit a signal whenever the time interval has elapsed.
        Parameters:
        timeout - time to wait before emitting message
        Returns:
        the time react.

      • randomly

        public static TimeReact randomly(int min,
                 int max)
        Factory to create a time based react. Emit a signal whenever the time interval has elapsed.
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum timeout.
        max - the maximim timeout.
        Returns:
        the time react.

      • framePerSecond

        public static TimeReact framePerSecond(int fps)
        Factory to create a time based react. Emit a signal at regular time interval (consider the observer function elapsed time).
        Parameters:
        fps - frame per second amount.
        Returns:
        the time react.
